author: nero_eth
content: Yeah I was thinking of treating it the same as a 7685 request. So, having the penalty in the CL and pass it to the EL for validation. We can also put the field in the EL header and have the CL apply it after payload execution.

author: fradamt
content: If we were to have proposers pay with stake, I think it would have to be a request that's included in the next beacon block. You can't know what the right payment should be until after executing
